paper_abstract: The determination of ordered weighted averaging (OWA) operator weights is a very crucial issue of applying the OWA operator for decision making. This paper proposes two new models for determining the OWA operator weights. The weights determined by the new models do not follow a regular distribution and therefore make more sense than those obtained by other methods. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Two new models for determining OWA operator weights
